plugin.name: cdparanoia
plugin.description: Read audio from CD in paranoid mode

element.name: cdparanoiasrc
element.description: Read audio from CD in paranoid mode
element.author: Erik Walthinsen <omega@cse.ogi.edu>, Wim Taymans <wim@fluendo.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: audio/x-raw-int, endianness=(int)1234, signed=(boolean)true, width=(int)16, depth=(int)16, rate=(int)44100, channels=(int)2
